en.title: IT Help Desk Technician
en.description: As a Help Desk Technician, I assisted users quickly fix tech issues and kept things running smoothly. I provided clear support and made sure problems were tracked so the team could work better together.

list.title: Key Responsibilities
items: Provided timely technical support and troubleshooting for hardware, software, and network issues, ensuring minimal downtime for end users.
Assisted with account setups, password resets, and software installations, improving user productivity and satisfaction.
Documented support requests and resolutions accurately, contributing to knowledge base improvements and efficient issue tracking.

en.title: Full Stack Developer Intern
en.description: Led the design of innovative user interfaces and experiences for Adobe's flagship products, focusing on data-driven design principles. Collaborated with product managers and engineers to create intuitive and visually appealing designs that enhance user engagement and satisfaction.

list.title: Key Responsibilities:
items: Developed high-fidelity prototypes and wireframes using Figma and Adobe XD.
Conducted user testing and research to inform design decisions.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure design consistency and quality.
Mentored junior designers in best practices and design methodologies.

en.title: Data Engineer
en.description: Led the design team in creating innovative user experiences for Apple's software products, focusing on enhancing usability and accessibility. Worked closely with product managers and engineers to develop design solutions that meet user needs and business objectives.

list.title: Key Responsibilities:
items: Designed user interfaces and experiences for Apple's software products.
Conducted user research and usability testing to inform design decisions.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure design feasibility and implementation.
Mentored junior designers in UX design best practices.
